articles.description: Follow live text updates and BBC Radio 5 Live commentary as Arsenal host Porto and Barcelona play Napoli in the second legs of their Champions League last-16 ties.
articles.title: Champions League: Build-up to Arsenal v Porto & Barcelona v Napoli

articles.description: Barcelona reach the Champions League quarter-finals for the first time in four years with an entertaining victory over Napoli at Estadi de Montjuic.
articles.title: Barcelona see off Napoli to reach quarter-finals

articles.description: England wing Immanuel Feyi-Waboso is ruled out of the Six Nations finale against France on Saturday because of concussion.
articles.title: England's Feyi-Waboso ruled out of Six Nations finale

articles.description: Middlesbrough move ninth in the Championship thanks to beating struggling Birmingham City after Riley McGree scores against his former club.
articles.title: Middlesbrough beat struggling Birmingham to go ninth

articles.description: Uefa says there "could be a problem" with ticketless fans for the Europa League final at Dublin's Aviva Stadium.
articles.title: Ticketless fans 'could be problem' at Europa final

articles.description: The politician who chairs the Culture, Media and Sport committee accuses Premier League clubs of making an "empty promise" about a new funding deal for the English Football League.
articles.title: Top-flight clubs accused of 'empty promise' on EFL funding

articles.description: State Man wins the Champion Hurdle as trainer Willie Mullins moves closer to the landmark of 100 Cheltenham Festival victories.
articles.title: Cheltenham Festival 2024: State Man wins Champion Hurdle for Willie Mullins

articles.description: Pace bowler James Anderson is excited to be part of England's plans in the summer but is not taking his place in the side as a given.
articles.title: I'm not getting any worse - Anderson

articles.description: Australia all-rounder Ellyse Perry becomes the first player to take a six-wicket haul in the Women's Premier League.
articles.title: Perry takes first six-wicket haul in WPL

articles.description: Liverpool owners Fenway Sports Group appoint ex-sporting director Michael Edwards as the company's chief executive of football.
articles.title: Edwards returns to key role with Liverpool owners FSG
